entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
